definition: (conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
Zhou Enlai's Five Principles of Peaceful Coexistence/1954 Panchsheel series of agreements between PRC and India
pinyin: he2 ping2 gong4 chu3 wu3 xiang4 yuan2 ze2

definition: the Four Cardinal Principles enunciated by Deng Xiaoping 鄧小平|邓小平[Deng4 Xiao3 ping2] in 1979: to uphold the socialist road, the dictatorship of the proletariat, the leadership of the CCP, and Maoism and Marxism-Leninism
pinyin: Si4 xiang4 Ji1 ben3 Yuan2 ze2

definition: One-China principle, the official doctrine that Taiwan is a province of China

sentences.english: Andre says here's a clear principle,the most particular.
sentences.chinese: 安德烈說這裏有一個明確的原則，最個人的。

sentences.english: It is a principle of first importance that federal courts are courts of limited jurisdiction.
sentences.chinese: 聯邦法院是有限管轄權法院，這是首要原則。

sentences.english: The ratio of commissions to be collected shall be set in accordance with the principle of making an inverse ratio to the auction completion price.
sentences.chinese: 收取佣金的比例按照同拍賣成交價成反比的原則確定。

sentences.english: Bentham sums up two principles that are applicable to penalty.
sentences.chinese: 邊沁歸納出了刑罰適用的兩個基本原則。

sentences.english: One corollary of this general principle is that services should not be stateful.
sentences.chinese: 此總體原則的一個推論就是，服務不應爲有狀態型的。

sentences.english: Inculcation is the basic way of Marxist theory education.
sentences.chinese: 灌輸是馬克思主義政治教育的基本原則。

sentences.english: Our Tax programme provides an introduction to CGT on shares - we explain the basic principles of CGT calculations on the sale of shares by individuals.
sentences.chinese: 解釋資本增值稅的基本原則及售賣股份後的計算方法。

sentences.english: Because "to go with the" existing law is a fundamental principle.
sentences.chinese: 因爲“地隨房走”是我國現行法的一項基本原則。

sentences.english: Eating caveman style is about PRINCIPLES.
sentences.chinese: 穴居人的飲食習慣就是遵守原則。

sentences.english: Our spirit is"customer first, honesty first". we establish a long-term cooperation relations with a number of enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 的原則，與多家企業建立了長期的合作關係。

sentences.english: He also reiterated that his country would continuously stick to the One China policy.
sentences.chinese: 羅普還重申斯將繼續堅持一箇中國的原則。

sentences.english: Connaught in good faith observe the operating principle of serving the majority of users.
sentences.chinese: 本着誠信守諾的經營原則服務於廣大用戶。

sentences.english: Reliability issues aside, there’s a deeper principle at stake here.
sentences.chinese: 先不提可靠性的問題，這裏面有一個更深層的原則。

sentences.english: First, China sticks to the principle of independence.
sentences.chinese: 第一，中國始終奉行獨立自主的原則。

sentences.english: The service purpose of the company is the principle based on good faith and costumers' satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 公司的服務宗旨以誠信爲本，以客戶的滿意爲原則。

sentences.english: Much could be gained by creating an international network of websites committed to such principles.
sentences.chinese: 創建一個遵循這些原則的國際互聯網站獲益頗豐。

definition: norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
to implement/to carry out/to put into practice
